Package org.opentcs.util.eventsystem

Interfaces and classes for event handling.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    EventFilter<E extends Event> Deprecated
    EventSource.addEventListener(org.opentcs.util.eventsystem.EventListener, org.opentcs.util.eventsystem.EventFilter) will be removed.
    EventListener<E extends Event>
    This interfaces declares the method that is called to notify an object of an event that has happened.
    EventSource<E extends Event>
    This interface declares methods for registering and unregistering event listeners with a source of events.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AcceptingTCSEventFilter Deprecated
    EventFilter is deprecated.
    AsynchronousEventHub<E extends Event>
    An EventHub implementation that dispatches events asynchronously, i.e.
    Event
    A generic event.
    EventHub<E extends Event>
    An EventHub dispatches events to registered listeners.
    RefusingTCSEventFilter Deprecated
    EventFilter is deprecated.
    SynchronousEventHub<E extends Event>
    An EventHub implementation that dispatches events synchronously, i.e.
    TCSEvent
    A TCS event.

Package org.opentcs.util.eventsystem Description

Interfaces and classes for event handling.
